import React from 'react'; const About = () => { return (

About Me

I'm a passionate Cloud Systems Engineer and DevOps Engineer specializing in building and maintaining scalable, cost-effective cloud infrastructure. I excel at automating complex deployment processes and optimizing cloud spending across AWS environments.

With expertise in Infrastructure as Code (Terraform), containerization with Docker and ECS, and comprehensive monitoring solutions (Dynatrace), I help organizations migrate from on-premises to cloud while maintaining high availability and performance standards.

I've successfully led cloud migration projects, moving entire server infrastructures and applications to AWS, migrating databases to RDS, and implementing automated patching workflows. Recently managed migration of 300+ WordPress websites to containerized solutions on EC2 with automated CI/CD pipelines, significantly improving deployment efficiency and reducing costs.

); }; export default About;
